name: atp-rankings-mcp
description: Model Context Protocol server for ATP Tennis Rankings historical data. Provides access to player statistics, career data, and rankings history from 1973 to present.
author: ATP Rankings Data Visualization

tools.name: search_players
tools.description: Search for tennis players by name. Returns a list of matching player names from the ATP rankings database.

query.description: Search query (player name or partial name)

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: get_player_factfile
tools.description: Get comprehensive career statistics for a tennis player including career high ranking, maximum points, weeks in top 100/10/1, and key dates.

tools.name: get_player_career
tools.description: Get time-series data of a player's ranking and points history throughout their career. Useful for generating charts and analyzing career progression.

tools.name: get_weeks_at_no1
tools.description: Get all players who have held the ATP world number 1 ranking and how many weeks they spent at #1. Results are sorted by weeks in descending order.

min_weeks.description: Filter to only show players with at least this many weeks at #1

top_n.description: Limit results to top N players by weeks

tools.name: get_all_weeks
tools.description: Get a list of all available weeks (dates) for which ATP rankings data is available. Useful for exploring the dataset coverage.

tools.name: get_week_rankings
tools.description: Get the complete ATP rankings table for a specific week, including rank, player name, and points for all ranked players.
